name: Path of Divine Devotion
description: Strengthen your faith and unlock the
sacred powers of divine healing and protection.
Serve the divine will and become a beacon
of hope for all who walk in darkness.

objectives.faith_test: Test of Faith: Maintain prayer for 30 minutes
objectives.compassion_test: Test of Compassion: Heal 20 wounded travelers
objectives.divine_test: Test of Divine Connection: Channel divine power

dialogs.start: The path of devotion requires unwavering faith in the divine.
dialogs.requirements: Your heart must be pure and your intentions noble.
dialogs.faith_trial: Faith is not just belief, but absolute trust in divine wisdom.
dialogs.compassion_trial: True priests heal not just the body, but the soul.
dialogs.divine_trial: Let the divine light flow through you and guide your actions.
dialogs.complete: The divine light shines brightly within you. You are blessed.
